summary: Add a real Rucksack to your Game
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1406282964.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=red][u][center][color=yellow][size=4]!! SKSE (Skyrim Script Extender) is required !![/size][/color][/center][/u] [/color]

[color=orange][u][center][color=yellow][size=4]The mod supports Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival and Hypothermia by Nitor.[/size][/color][/center][/u] [/color]

[color=orange][u][center][color=yellow][size=4]The mod supports Dragonkiller Cart. The Rucksack recognizes the items from DKC. Duplicate spells are removed from this mode[/size][/color][/center][/u][/color]

[color=orange][u][center][heading][color=yellow][size=6]Buy your adventure rucksack and the equipment at a merchant[/size][/color][/heading][/center][/u] [/color]

[center][size=4][color=#f4cccc]- Riverwood Trader
- Revyn Sadri Windhelm
- Belethor Whitrun
- Bits and Pieces Solitude
- the Caravan Merchant[/color][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]iHyd-6IayOA&f[/youtube][/center]

[center]
[size=4][color=yellow]The Rucksack has two secure container:[/color]
[color=pink](If you have more then one, they link to the same container and form list)[/color]
[color=yellow]- Rucksack inventory (free programmable script)[/color]
[color=pink]- - fill up your items and use "set content" on rucksack menu.[/color]
[color=pink]- -the rucksack has the weight of its contents[/color]
[color=yellow]- Rucksack Equipment[/color]
[color=pink]- - bind your equipment on the rucksack[/color]

[color=yellow]The visible and usable equipment[/color]
[color=pink]- Ad. standing Torch
- Ad. Bedroll
- Ad. smal Tent
- Ad. Cooking Pot[/color]

[color=yellow]Additional usable equipment[/color]
[color=pink]- Ad. Torch Oil
- Ad. small Tent Poles[/color]

[color=yellow]The Power Spell:[/color]
[color=pink]- Ad. collecting Firewood
- Ad. build a Campfire
- Ad. sit down
- Ad. lie down[/color][/size][/center]

[color=orange][u][center][heading][color=yellow][size=6]Kauf dein Abenteuer Rucksack sowie Ausrüstung bei einem Händler[/size][/color][/heading][/center][/u] [/color]

[center]
[size=4][color=yellow]Der Rucksack hat zwei sichere Container:[/color]
[color=pink](hast du mehr als ein Rucksack sind sie mit dem selben Container und Formliste verbunden)[/color]
[color=yellow]- Rucksack Inventar (frei programierbarer Skript)[/color]
[color=pink]- - lege deine Items in den Rucksack und benutze "Inhalt festlegen" am Rucksack Menü.[/color]
[color=pink]- - Der Rucksack hat das Gewicht seiner Inhalte[/color]
[color=yellow]- Rucksack Ausrüstung[/color]
[color=pink]- - binde deine Ausrüstung auf den Rucksack[/color]

[color=yellow]sichtbare und benutzbare Ausrüstung[/color]
[color=pink]- Ab. Standfackel
- Ab. Schlafsack
- Ab. kleines Zelt
- Ab. Kochtopf[/color]

[color=yellow]zusätzliche benutzbare Ausrüstung[/color]
[color=pink]- Ab. Fackelöl
- Ab. kleine Zeltstangen[/color]

[color=yellow]die Fähigkeiten:[/color]
[color=pink]- Ab. Feuerholz sammeln
- Ab. ein Lagerfeuer aufbauen
- Ab. ich muss absitzen
- Ab. ich muss mich hinlegen[/color][/size][/center]

[Line]
[Line]

[color=yellow][center][u]if you want, see also my other mod.[/u][/center][/color]

[center]Clouds for Skyrim[/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58471][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1411736325.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center]Asky - almost like a real dog[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36481][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1383310135.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center]collecting Firewood.[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29923][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1358175560.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center]Dragonkiller Cart[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25493][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1366464828.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center]The Books of Dovahkiin s Nomad Equipment. This is the same PlugIn as Dragonkiller Cart. The same PlugIn with a other integration.[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28891][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1355254310.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center]Dog Laika Reloaded[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30055][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1358419836.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center]Dovahkiins Safe[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32303][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3522536-1361686306.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[Line]

Version History:

Adventure Rucksack Update 1.11

Bug Fix:
-Each backpack model now calculates the correct weight of both container


Adventure Rucksack Update 1.1

- If Dragonkiller Cart (DKC) is detected.
(duplicate spells are removed from this mode)
- the Rucksack recognizes the items from DKC.
- Oil from DKC also works with this torch etc.
- new power: Ad. lie down

Version 1.0
-first Release
author: Xgrufijury
